title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“They [evolutionists] say science is based on the ability to verify or falsify findings through experimentation and observation.” [spoken by Bill Rice of Cleveland's WCPN Radio, on * All Things Considered, National Public Radio, March 12, 2002.]*
